QuestData.Title: Rendezvous with the Ritualists
QuestData.Description: Our dear brother Sekara went to the Ravenskar with some of the flock to enact the great ritual of purification.$b$bNo one has been sent back to the nest for supplies in the past day; caught up in prayers I suppose.$b$bI would go check on him but I need to make sure the scribe didn't mess up her transcription of my latest sermon. Could you do it? I'll be there in... well, who knows...
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ravenspeaker Sekara in the Ravenskar.
QuestData.RewardText: At last, our prayers to the Raven Mother have been answered!
